description: Extracts property values out of a message, applies an aggregate function and provides them as a probe stream on a time frame.

properties.name: probename
properties.label: Probe Name
properties.description: Assign a name to this probe to identify the stream to assign it to a dashboard component.

properties.name: properties
properties.label: Properties
properties.description: Provide the names of the properties that provide the values. For 'count' function use name 'count'

properties.name: func
properties.label: Function
properties.description: Provide the function that is applied on the property values.

properties.name: fieldlabels
properties.label: Field Labels
properties.description: Add a label for property for dashboard charts.

properties.name: updateintervalsec
properties.label: Update Interval Seconds
properties.description: Interval in seconds in which the updates are sent to the dashboard component.

properties.name: resetinterval
properties.label: Reset Interval
properties.description: Interval in which the aggregation value is reset to 0.
